title: Ep. 837 Troubling New Information Surfaces
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address the media’s theories about the suspicious packages delivered to Democrat officials and why their calls for “civility” are disingenuous. I also cover the troubling details of the interview with George Papadopoulos on Fox this morning. 
 
News Picks:
An arrest is made in the suspicious packages case.
 
Michael Avenatti is having a really bad month. 
 
Lee Smith’s new piece addresses the trouble with the Mueller probe.
 
Who are the activists behind the immigrant caravan?
 
Socialists are confused as to why people are leaving high-tax states.
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
